subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: With its combination of low-speed corners and long, fast straights ending in brutal braking areas, the Circuit Gilles Villeneuve on the Île Notre-Dame provides teams with a number of setup challenges.
snippet: With its combination of low-speed corners and long, fast straights ending in brutal braking areas, the Circuit Gilles Villeneuve on the Île Notre-Dame provides teams with a number of setup challenges.
